articles.content: RIP to Facebook Messenger’s desktop app. The native app for Mac and Windows is no longer available to users as of today, December 15, 2025, and existing users are being directed to the Facebook websi… [+1845 chars]

articles.author: Mark Rosewater
articles.title: Playing to Lorwyn, Part 2 - Magic: The Gathering
articles.description: Mark discusses the mechanics of the Lorwyn block, their reception, and prepares the audience for Lorwyn Eclipsed.
articles.content:
Last week, I started telling the story of the Lorwyn block's design. We left off with the team finalizing the nine creature types for Lorwyn. We'll pick up the story from there.
